snippet: Five to seven meetings among conference commissioners between now and July 4 will help shape the future of the college football postseason.
abstract: Eleven college football conference commissioners will meet five to seven times over the next few months in order to iron out league's postseason; commissioners indicate being open to establishing a four-team playoff.
lead_paragraph: Five to seven meetings among conference commissioners between now and July 4 will help shape the future of the college football postseason.

headline.seo: Talks Begin With an Open Mind on College Football Playoff
headline.main: With an Open Mind on a Playoff, Conference Commissioners Meet
headline.print_headline: With an Open Mind on a Playoff, Conference Commissioners Meet
